item.title: DevOps Whitepapers
item.description: AWS AWS Whitepapers & Guides - expand your knowledge of the cloud with AWS technical content authored by AWS and the AWS community, including technical whitepapers, technical guides, reference material, and reference architecture diagrams Introduction to DevOps on AWS
item.content:encoded:
AWS

  • AWS Whitepapers & Guides - expand your knowledge of the cloud with AWS technical content authored by AWS and the AWS community, including technical whitepapers, technical guides, reference material, and reference architecture diagrams
  • Introduction to DevOps on AWS

item.title: List of ETL Tools
item.description: What is ETL ? Extracting data from sources Transforming data into data models Loading data into data warehouses ETL Tools Ab Initio AWS Data Pipeline AWS Glue Azure Data Factory CloverDX Datastage Google Cloud Dataflow Hevo Informatica Integrate Matillion Pentaho Data Integration (PDI) Qlik Compose SAP Data Services SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) Stitch Talend
item.content:encoded:
What is ETL ?

  • Extracting data from sources
  • Transforming data into data models
  • Loading data into data warehouses

ETL Tools

  • Ab Initio
  • AWS Data Pipeline
  • AWS Glue
  • Azure Data Factory
  • CloverDX
  • Datastage
  • Google Cloud Dataflow
  • Hevo
  • Informatica
  • Integrate
  • Matillion
  • Pentaho Data Integration (PDI)
  • Qlik Compose
  • SAP Data Services
  • SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS)
  • Stitch
  • Talend
